credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
dimensions:
case open: L: 27 x W: 12.8 x D: 2cm
case closed: L: 27 x W: 6.4 x D: 3.1cm
title: Case
description: Mahogany case for three implements, irregular rectangular shape. Lid attached to bottom with two brass hinges and small hooks. Top of lid carved with scrolled acanthus leaves, in the shape of three "cartouches". Inside of case covered with silk, S-shaped scroll on the inside of case to hold the knife in place.
name: Case
